players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "'I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden demise. Let's all focus on finding out who did this and bring them to justice.'..."

Diana: "'I believe we should all work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. It is crucial for our safety and peace of mind. Let us not jump to conclusions, but rather gather all available information before making any accusations.'"

Bob: "Based on the information we have so far, it's crucial that we remain calm and open-minded. Let's work together to gather more clues and piece together what happened last night. We can't let fear or assumptions cloud our judgment."

You: "I agree with both Bob and Diana that we should all work together to gather more information before making any accusations. Let's focus on finding the truth behind Charlie's death and ensuring everyone's safety in this game."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
